name: W. Todd Kaneko
bio: W. Todd Kaneko is the author of This is How the Bone Sings (Black Lawrence Press, 2020) and The Dead Wrestler Elegies (Curbside Splendor, 2014). His poems and prose have appeared in Bellingham Review, Los Angeles Review, Barrelhouse, PANK, the Collagist, and many other places. A recipient of fellowships from Kundiman and the Kenyon Review Writer’s Workshop, he is currently coeditor of Waxwing and teaches at Grand Valley State University in Michigan.
